subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: At their annual round table, the N.F.L.’s coaches stayed true to form. Belichick gave short answers. Rex Ryan offered bluster. The Jets’ new coach, Todd Bowles, was eager to get going.
snippet: At their annual round table, the N.F.L.’s coaches stayed true to form. Belichick gave short answers. Rex Ryan offered bluster. The Jets’ new coach, Todd Bowles, was eager to get going.
